_header: Lenten is come with love to town / with blossom and with birds roun
_description: Lenten is come with love to town — three 12-line stanzas (aabccbddbeeb)

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Lenten ys come wiþ loue to toune wiþ blosmen &
                    wiþ briddes roune…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…þis wunne weole y wole forgon ant wyht in wode be
                    fleme
